text: The Association des professionnels navigants de l'aviation (APNA) (in ) is a French aeronautical non-profit organization created in 1927 in order to "group, in a close community all those who belong, by their profession, to the civil aviation, and participate in the development of the national aeronautics, in conjunction with the public authorities, the manufacturers, the airlines and the professionals unions". 80 ans d’Histoire L’Association des Professionnels Navigants de l’Aviation == References == Category:Aviation in France Category:Non-profit organizations of France Category:1927 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in France Category:Trade associations
title: Association des professionnels navigants de l'aviation
